headline: Mansour Doumbia — Project Portfolio
tagline: Mechanical systems, hardware integration, and simulation-driven build work across CubeSat, robotics, and experimental propulsion.
about: I’m a Harvard College student studying Mechanical Engineering and Neuroscience. My work emphasizes practical fabrication, hardware integration, and analysis workflows that translate into testable engineering decisions.
strengths: PCB/hardware development for robotics power systems
Satellite systems and space hardware integration
Computational data analysis and probabilistic modeling
courses: AM105 — Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations
STAT 110 — Introduction to Statistics and Probability
